attributes.action: mr tony  blair should deport himself for the state of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after your terror rein and the state of my country you should rid your self from our great shores !!! my country is england no more unless i speak polish or hurdu !!!! may GOD judge you one day , if he dont the history books will

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
